鹼土金屬.en: alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)

麵食.en: food made from wheat flour, such as noodles, dumplings, buns etc

黃岩.en: Huangyan district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

黑眉長尾山雀.en: (bird species of China) black-browed bushtit (Aegithalos bonvaloti)
黑眉長尾山雀.pinyin: hei1 mei2 chang2 wei3 shan1 que4

黑頸鷿鷈.en: (bird species of China) black-necked grebe (Podiceps nigricollis)

鼎湖.en: Dinghu district of Zhaoqing city 肇慶市|肇庆市[Zhao4 qing4 shi4], Guangdong

鼠竄.en: to scamper off, to scurry off like a frightened rat

齋祭.en: to offer sacrifices (to gods or ancestors) whilst abstaining from meat, wine etc

龍港區.en: Longgang district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning

龠.en: ancient unit of volume (half a 合[ge3], equivalent to 50ml), ancient flute
